channel.title: Hi, I'm Oleg from StartHQ
channel.description:
I'm bootstrapping [StartHQ][1], which is a SaaS directory and management service, by running JavaScript workshops, consulting and doing tech due diligence for investors.
Glad to have found this forum!
PS. If you're working on a B2B SaaS solution, please [submit it here][2] and I'll help spread the word.
[1]: https://starthq.com [2]: https://starthq.com/apps/submit

item.title: Hi, I'm Oleg from StartHQ
item.dc:creator: ian
item.description:
Welcome Oleg! Glad to have you aboard.

Read full topic
